resources.string: Enable Extra dim when the brightness is lower than the minimum screen brightness. Note: The minimum screen brightness is the brightness value in HAL, not necessarily 0~100% for every model, for example, the Xiaomi Mi 12s is 0~50%, you can adjust the brightness to the minimum brightness without strobe, then check \"Current HAL Brightness\". I actually measured that the minimum brightness of Xiaomi Mi 12s is 7.99%, please test other models by yourself
Solve the problem of AOD brightness and under-screen fingerprint, which may cause flickering when opening the screen
Enable Extra Dim when screen brightness is lower than this value (0~100)
The larger the value, the darker the screen (0~100), greater than 95 may cause the screen to be hard to read
You seem to be using an outdated version of LSPosed or LSPosed is not active, please update LSPosed or activate it and try again.
Enable Extra dim when the brightness is lower than the minimum screen brightness.
Cannot obtain HAL Brightness, Activate the module and reboot and try again
Cannot obtain Reduce Bright Strength, Activate the module and reboot and try again
